abstract: HSBC, the big British bank, said that its chief executive would relocate to Hong Kong next year, a move that underscores the growing importance of Asia for global financial institutions.
snippet: HSBC, the big British bank, said that its chief executive would relocate to Hong Kong next year, a move that underscores the growing importance of Asia for global financial institutions.
lead_paragraph: In a move that underscores the growing importance of Asia and emerging markets for global financial institutions, the British bank HSBC said Friday that its chief executive would relocate to Hong Kong next year.

headline.main: HSBC to Move Chief to Hong Kong
